name: Text-Color Semantic Hierarchy
description: Text-color tokens have distinct semantic roles. Each token family is designed for a specific type of content and should not be used outside its intended purpose.

--ks-text-color-display.role: Display headings and hero text — high-impact, full-contrast type
--ks-text-color-display.rationale: Display text-color uses full foreground color (no alpha) for maximum contrast, intended for type set in --ks-font-family-display at large sizes

--ks-text-color-default.role: Default UI text — headings below hero level, section headings, card titles, interface labels
--ks-text-color-default.rationale: Default uses fg-alpha-3 — slightly softened from pure foreground, appropriate for mid-hierarchy text elements

--ks-text-color-copy.role: Body copy — paragraph text, descriptions, long-form reading content
--ks-text-color-copy.rationale: Copy text-color is optimized for reading comfort at body sizes, paired with --ks-font-family-copy and --ks-line-height-copy-*

--ks-text-color-interface.role: Form controls and interactive UI chrome — inputs, selects, buttons
--ks-text-color-interface.rationale: Interface uses fg-alpha-2 — designed for UI controls at --ks-font-family-interface sizes

--ks-text-color-card.role: Card surface text — text on card backgrounds with adjusted contrast
--ks-text-color-card.rationale: Card text-color is tuned for contrast against --ks-background-color-card surfaces

--ks-text-color-on-primary.role: Text on primary-colored backgrounds — ensures contrast on brand-color surfaces
--ks-text-color-on-primary.rationale: On-primary text-color is specifically designed for contrast against --ks-background-color-primary-* surfaces

--ks-text-color-primary.role: Primary-colored text — brand-color accent text for emphasis, links, highlights
--ks-text-color-primary.rationale: Primary text-color uses the brand primary color for text emphasis

--ks-text-color-positive.role: Positive/success state text — success messages, confirmations
--ks-text-color-positive.rationale: Semantic color for positive feedback states

--ks-text-color-negative.role: Negative/error state text — error messages, validation failures
--ks-text-color-negative.rationale: Semantic color for negative/error feedback states

--ks-text-color-notice.rationale: Semantic color for warning/notice feedback states

--ks-text-color-informative.role: Informative state text — info messages, tips, helper text
--ks-text-color-informative.rationale: Semantic color for informational feedback states
